Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Would give zero stars, but apparently you have to hit at least one to be able to write a review. Terrible food, and terrible staff service. Definitely avoid going if you don’t want the middle-aged man managing the restaurant feeling you up …

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: The restaurant staff (middle aged man) was rude and behaved inappropriately through body language. Never coming back. Please make sure your staff to trained to know how to behave with customers. In addition, the food was undercooked, under-seasoned and arrived after an hour of waiting.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Nice cosy place. Good service and friendly owner. Nice options for vegetarians. Kulfi and gajar halwa are the best here.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Great food, probably the best Indian food in city. However, the staff is cunning in nature, and will throw all sorts of excuses especially if you have booked the restaurant using some discount app. …

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Good restaurant to try Indian food. I visited along with my friends from Japan and Germany. They liked the food very much. The service also excellent. They provided food in less possible time and as per the demands of ours. I recommend Shiva restaurant to be tried by everyone atleast once to get good Indian food.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: It’s an OK OK place. The menu is a typical Indian fare, nothing special or out of the ordinary. The place is clean and cosy. The downside is the staff are not good. It felt like they were just doing a robotic job. No hospitality or warmth.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Good food, service was the slowest I've ever experienced in my life. Took over an hour to get the first dish. I guess they had a bad night, but still... Waiting so long when you're hungry isn't a fun experience.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Good quality Indian food. I think the manager knows what to recommend and understand your tolerability of spiciness. Nans are fresh and hot, as well as other food. The price is suitable.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text:
Butter chicken perfect! And the best cheese naan we've ever had!
Service's good, its just one lady but a very nice lady (:

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: The owner moved from Calcutta to Netherlands in 1975. The restaurant is open from last 30 years. The food and desserts were delicious and tasted like a typical Indian food. Definitely recommend this place!

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Nothing but the best ever Indian food in Amsterdam, i spent 8 days here and tried most of the Indian restaurants , no one can beat this place taste! Good job guys

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Had a fantastic meal here yesterday. This atmosphere here is warm and the food is authentic and tasty.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Seemed quite basic when I entered and fairly empty but it soon filled up (was half-full by 730pm!). …

Name: Restaurant Shiva

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text:
Best Indian restaurant

Review Text:

My heart was broken when I saw they served cold samosas from inside, it took …

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Actually really good food!

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Average starters seekh kebabs needed to be cooked more but the chicken madras was by far the best I have ever had. I would have given 5 stars but the starters let it down I will definitely be back to eat here again

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: The food here is excellent! It has a nice atmosphere and the service is amazing. Prices are very reasonable as well.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: I have been going to Shiva for years. The food is always tasty and the staff are super friendly.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Great food and very friendly service!! Recommended place!

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: This is the best Indian restaurant I've ever been and I have been to quite a few all over the world! Quality has not changed since I first ate here many years ago. The wide variety of food is so very flavourful and fresh. The staff is warm …

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Mediocre food and bad service at good location. Menus were dirty, salad was dry and there was a hair in rice cup. When pointed out, no apologies, no refund, just took it away and brought back bluntly. Some service but no hospitality. Was not worth it after a great truffle trip.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Try Shiva restaurant in mainland of Amsterdam a Indian restaurant they do have thalis too

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: This is the best Indian restaurant ever. Discovered it with Dad a couple of years ago when he was here from Denmark and have been eating there everytime he was here. Now that he has passed away, we still eat there in his memory just because the food is outstanding and the staff is so kind and friendly.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text:
Excellent restaurant.
Perfect service and very friendly owner.
The food is great and worth the price

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: This restaurant is a hidden gem! Every dish we had was Absolutely perfect all the right and best quality spices and meat was also nice and tender, the service is also fantastic!will definitely be back! Would have posted pictures but won’t let me for some reason Iphone 11 playing up I guess!

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Wow. This is my best indian restaurant i hawe visited. Excellent service excellent food. Good for vegans 😊

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Food was quite good. Portions(quantity) is decent for main dish, not too pricey. They don't have an extensive menu but the usual choices are there, to tinkle your taste buds. Surprisingly, has quite decent biryani as well. Its doesn't have an exquisite ambience, but is a Decent place with nice food.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Everything is very delicious...🎉

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: A small but recommended place. I had a very tasty (mild) butter chicken with good rice and garlic naan. The food was very good and authentic, the staff friendly. I'd love to come again.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: This restaurant has been around for 30 years and run by a Bengali from Calcutta who also lived in Delhi. The food is mostly north Indian/ Punjabi food. The service is very attentive and the food is quite alright. The portions are generous …

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Every time I go, I have a great dinner. I have been coming to this restaurant for many years now. The food is great, service is good and the owner and staff are very friendly. …

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Decent Indian restaurant within easy walking distance from Rembrandtplein and de Dam. A friend and I enjoyed a leisurely meal here on Saturday evening. There are cheaper Indian options in the area, but the butter chicken was nice and creamy and the portion size was generous.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Nice ambiance, lovely service and pretty solid Indian food. I’m personally more fond of stronger spices and flavors, but if you are new to Indian cuisine or like your flavors more on the delicate side, this place is for you. I got the Sheek …

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: It stays at the Bottom of the list for me if I have to rank all Indian restaurants I have dined-in in Amsterdam in last 2.5 years. The samosas were extremely oily and bit stale, chicken rubbery and the staff not so pleasant either.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Very good food for a low price. Lots of dishes to choose from and a great vegetarian selection. Not all personnel seem to speak Dutch however, which can be a pity for native speaking visitors, however, international visitors will be pleased to get to a restaurant where they will be helped in English.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: It is good place to eat Indian food at Amsterdam centrum, it is very near rembradtplein tram stop. You will need to make table reservation , it helps you to avoid waiting. …

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: We ordered the vegetarian side dishes and naan. The cauliflower was good but the dal and chickpea ones lacked flavor. The server was friendly until we ordered side dishes, we were simply not hungry enough to order large portions! Very rude.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: One of Amsterdam’s top 3 Indian restaurants, with great service.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text:
Kind of okey. Not good, bad boy bad either.
Can't recommend this place.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: The first time I came here was in 2006 and it's still my all time favorite! Brought all my friends who are coming there now too! The Nan bread is the best Nan in Amsterdam by the way.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: We popped in just before closing and had a lovely meal. We shared the garlic tikka and prawn biriyani, both were really tasty and we would definitely return.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Thank you for an amazing Indian experience and food.  After all the bad places our group of 10 had been it was good to get some decent food.  Although there was a hiccup with our table at the start your food and charm made up for it.  The only change i would make would be the dips you dont get to much for a large group.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Food was quite tasty. The service is slow but manageable. The lady serving was very polite. The man who served was quite rude . The food I would rate 3 to 4 but service not up to mark

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: My girlfriend chose this place and then when they were out of my choice (lamb masala I think) my expectations were fairly low... It turned out to be a blessing though as we got the shiva shared meal instead and it was absolutely delicious. …

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Very good hotel for authentic Indian food. We ordered south indian veg and non-veg items. Food was good. Service and staff were polite and served us better. A must visit.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Discovered this place by Accident. Really quaint, small place. Wonderful North Indian Food!! Probably the best I’ve had in Amsterdam.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: I told the waiter I wanted something very spicy with chicken and was recommended a Chicken Vindaloo. After some waiting, where I was served some snack to kill the time, the main course arrived. It looked like it would not be enough, but …

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Delicious Indian food! Friendly staff and great atmosphere. Pleasantly surprised by the quality of the place. Try the veggie platter, it is worth every bite.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Good service, but below average Indian cuisine. Limited menu choice and quite expensive for what you get. Better Indian restaurants in the area.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: We orderd the vegetarian menu - it was quite a small portion and not very tasty. I have never eaten such  unspectacular, not-spicy Indian food before. We've been quite dissapointet.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: As Amsterdammers we often eat here when we go to the movies... the Indian food is really delicious, and the restaurant has a good, relaxed 'dining out' atmosphere. The owners are very corteous, in short: it is a pleasure!

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: 6 stars. Best service we experienced in our 5 days in Amsterdam, Best Indian food we have ever had and a large selection of vegan/vegetarian dishes. I certainly recommend dining here.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: We spotted this place while on the tram through the city and what a gem find this was. We had a variety of potato, pumpkin and brinjal pakoras for starters and paneer and the gobi masala for the mains. It was out of this world incredible, …

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Best Indian food I’ve had in a long time! The butter chicken and chicken korma comes highly recommended, with high quality naan! Truly great 👌🏼

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Worst service I have ever had. After 1 hour of wait, we asked them when will our food arrive and they said " if you want yesterday's food then we can give you immediately otherwise we are preparing fresh so it will take time". Food was not tasty.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text:
Nobody in the restaurant at 1pm... Should alert me. Only 2 starters availaible in a menu of ten. No naan...😱

Review Text:
10 star out of 5 star.
Really Its not exgeration but reality. Really good taste of Indian cusions Abroad. Best thing is owners taking personal intrest in customer needs. We were there …

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: OOH MY DEAR GOD the food is so good I went 3 times in a week and didn't take a pictures, just try the biryani lame and chicken butter, maybe tandoori and naan butter bread, just make sure your not late it almost always full at dinner time

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: The best Indian restaurant in the town. We founf it once by chance and since then we come at least once per month. Good food and nice people working there!!

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: We have read a lot of reviews about this and selected this. I must admit, it has surprised us with the ambiance, quality, taste and service. This is by no means a cheap eat but is worth the penny spent.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: First the quantity of biryani was very less. We ordered 2 Chicken biryani and it was like one chicken biryani, the biryani rice was not cooked properly and when we told the owner about it on the way out she dint even respond.

Name: Restaurant Shiva

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: It's a nice restaurant.I visited there yesterday food is good.The only thing I want to request owner is to please use some other paper instead of om written on it .Aum is very powerful and respectful word please don't use it in base of foods you serve.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: The Butter Chicken was lovely and the service very good and friendly. Will definitely come back when I'm in Amsterdam again.

Review Text: The staff was very rude. On asking for a glass of water, he taunted me saying that this is not allowed and behaved as if he doesn't wants us to serve it, just because we were also having some food bought from outside as well.

Review Text: I ordered the butter chicken delivered to my house. the butter chicken is 18euro and you'll get that with some rice. 12 small chunks of chicken is for 18 euro too expensive for what you get.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Not a very good place. The service is polite, but rather slow. The food is not bad but nothing special either. Same for the atmosphere. All in all - I'd recommend to go somewhere else.

Review Text: 5 star value in their tandoori meals!  Washed down with red wine or indian beer,always satisfying.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Best Indian food in The Netherlands! We tried Baingan Bharta in Bombay style and Paneer saag! Authentic and delicious 👌, service is great!

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Muy bueno ! Gracias Dupa la señora camarera. A very cozy and quiet place to be and enjoy the typically Indian meal, music, hospitality. Perfect!

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Best Indian food in Amsterdam, the owner usually works there, he's very kind and generous, the staff is also friendly, I go there at least once per month :)

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Great indian restaurant serving perfect portion sizes of high quality indian food. Very friendly to all guests and welcoming to single diners.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Food is great and the owner is a gem. Very friendly staff and a must visit place for Indian food in Amsterdam.

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: Excellent service and the food is made fresh with effort and care which you can taste. Served within adequate time as well.

Name: Restaurant Shiva

Name: Restaurant Shiva
Review Text: I have dined here on two occasions and it has to be said they are the best indian i have experienced in Amsterdam , lovely people Highly recommended .
